'''Richard O'Callaghan''', born '''Richard Rooke''', is a British actor. He provided the voice of [[Meriadoc Brandybuck]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' 1981 radio series]] that was broadcast on [[BBC|BBC 4]].
